title: Headlight Bowl - Installation

body.body: Warning - General - Stabilise Motorcycle Including locking devices
Warning - General - Stabilise Motorcycle - including DO NOT support on non integral parts
Make sure the motorcycle is stabilised and adequately supported.
Do not support the motorcycle on any ancillary component, the exhaust system or any other non structural parts of the motorcycle frame.
A correctly supported motorcycle will help prevent it from falling.
Failure to follow the advice above could result in serious injury or death.
Note to be used in service manual with stabilise warning
Renew locking devices where specified, refer to
Before tightening a fixing using a crow foot spanner adapter, refer to
Use of Crow Foot Spanner Adapters with Torque Wrenches
Observe all torque wrench tightening procedures, refer to
Headlight Installation DU4 DT4 DTC DUB DTB DUC
Refit the headlight bowl while feeding the harnesses into the headlight bowl. Do not fully tighten the fixings at this stage.
Install the rubber harness grommet into the headlamp bowl.
Reconnect the indicator electrical connectors as noted during removal.
Reconnect the headlight electrical connector and DRL/position light electrical connector.
Refit the headlight, tightening the fixings to

metadata.ModelsTaxonomyLink: DUC; DTB; DUB; DTC; DT4; DU4

body.body: Seat and Battery - Install DB4; DBB; DT4; DTB; DTC; DU4; DUB; DUC

body.body: Check the headlight operation and the beam setting, rectify as necessary.

search: Headlight Bowl - Installation
Make sure the motorcycle is stabilised and adequately supported.
Do not support the motorcycle on any ancillary component, the exhaust system or any other non structural parts of the motorcycle frame.
A correctly supported motorcycle will help prevent it from falling.
Failure to follow the advice above could result in serious injury or death.
Renew locking devices where specified, refer to
Fixings
Before tightening a fixing using a crow foot spanner adapter, refer to
Use of Crow Foot Spanner Adapters with Torque Wrenches
Observe all torque wrench tightening procedures, refer to
Tightening Procedures
Refit the headlight bowl while feeding the harnesses into the headlight bowl. Do not fully tighten the fixings at this stage.
Headlight bowl mounting fixings
Install the rubber harness grommet into the headlamp bowl.
Reconnect the indicator electrical connectors as noted during removal.
Reconnect the headlight electrical connector and DRL/position light electrical connector.
Refit the headlight, tightening the fixings to
4 Nm
Headlight fixing (one of two)
Perform the following operations:
Battery - Installation
Seat - Installation
Check the headlight operation and the beam setting, rectify as necessary.
